means: （动物）以（垃圾、腐肉）为食( scavenge的现在分词 )

entry.tran: 捡破烂;拾荒;(从废弃物中)觅食，寻找
entry.def: If people or animals scavenge for things, they collect them by searching among waste or unwanted objects.

example.ex: Many are orphans, their parents killed as they scavenged for food...
example.tran: 很多人是孤儿，他们的父母在垃圾中找吃的时丢了性命。

means.word_mean: 1. searching for and salvaging anything useful from discarded material;
2. searching for and feeding on decaying matter;
